column1: # SOURCE: FAO Irrigation and Drainage Paper 56 + adjustments for hot arid climate
# DESCRIPTION: Crop coefficients and growing characteristics for 5 crops
#   - kc_mid: Crop coefficient at full canopy/peak growth (dimensionless
#   - season_length_days: Total growing period from planting to harvest (days)
#   - water_stress_sensitivity: High/Medium/Low sensitivity to water stress

column2: adjusted for hot arid conditions (higher Kc due to advection)

column3: no water stress under proper irrigation
